refnamediv.refpurpose: Set the flag to save full alpha channel information (as opposed to single-color transparency) when saving PNG images.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: imagesavealpha sets the flat to attempt to save full alpha channel information (as opposed to single-color transparency) when saving PNG images.
You have to unset alphablending (imagealphaplending($im,&false;)), to use it.
Alpha channel is not supported by all browsers, if you have problem with your browser, try to load your script with a alpha channel compliant browser, e.g. latest Mozilla.
